SEARCH
Package service

Class AppointmentScheduleService

java.lang.Object
service.AppointmentScheduleService
public class AppointmentScheduleService extends Object
The AppointmentScheduleService class provides functionality for checking the availability of time slots for appointments and retrieving available doctors for a given time frame.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lim Jun Howe

    • AppointmentScheduleService

      public AppointmentScheduleService(AppointmentService appointmentService, PatientRepository patientRepository, DoctorRepository doctorRepository)
      Constructs an AppointmentScheduleService with the necessary dependencies.
      Parameters:
      appointmentService - The service to manage appointments.
      patientRepository - The repository for managing patient data.
      doctorRepository - The repository for managing doctor data.

  • Method Details

    • isSlotFree

      public boolean isSlotFree(String doctorId, String patientId, LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime)
      Checks if a given time slot is available for both the doctor and the patient.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor.
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      startDateTime - The start time of the appointment.
      endDateTime - The end time of the appointment.
      Returns:
      true if the time slot is free, otherwise false.

    • getAvailableDoctors

      public Doctor[] getAvailableDoctors(String patientId, LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime)
      Retrieves an array of doctors who are available during the specified time slot for a given patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      startDateTime - The start time of the appointment.
      endDateTime - The end time of the appointment.
      Returns:
      An array of available doctors.
